data.name: Stunning Policewoman
data.detailed_description:
This is a city full of crime, the player as a stunning policewoman, criminals arrested and detained in the police station.
The city is riddled with crime because of a lack of police. The addition of a new policewoman on this day may change all that. Players experience the work of a female police officer arresting criminals.
· The player can drive the police sports car to patrol the city, in response to any crime.
· The police headquarters will immediately inform the player of the exact location of the crime, and the player needs to drive the vehicle to the destination at full speed.
· Eliminate criminal gangs: The player controls the heroine to fight criminals with a whip.
· Arrest a suspicious person: The police headquarters sends a photo of a suspicious person, and the player needs to find a suspicious person on the street based on the photo, and arrest them and send them to the police station.
· Stop a suspicious vehicle: The police headquarters sends the license plate of a suspicious vehicle. Players need to find and stop the suspicious vehicle based on the license plate and drive it to the police station.
· The player may be injured during the completion of the mission, which will cause the player to fail the mission and continue the game after recovering in the hospital.
· Bonus for completing tasks.

data.short_description: This is a city full of crime, the player as a stunning policewoman, criminals arrested and detained in the police station.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: win7/win8/win10
  • Processor: i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX960
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: win7/win8/win10
  • Processor: i7
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX1050
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
